page.title: 11LANDSCAPE AND BUILDINGS
page.content: The area landscape is very flat with large fields seperated by hedges.The land is very light and when it rains or when the wind blows when the land is very dry part of the top soil is lost. Because of this more hedges are being planted to prevent the loss of the soil. . The{Grange}is situated on the highest point of the village and was built in 1864 for Â£19.17.6. It was a Rectory until 1960 when it was converted into flats, then a holiday home and is now being made into an old peoples home.
